cards.rules_text:
Modal spells you cast have entwine {X}, where X is the number of modes that spell has. [i](You may pay an additional {X} as you cast that spell. If you do, choose all of its modes.)[/i]
[i]Narrative[/i] — Whenever you cast a modal or split spell, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on The Traveler.

Choose one or more —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Counter target spell.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.

Mount Elsewhere enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Put a vista counter on each of up to two target lands you control. They gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”

When Thuul the Beastmaster enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Beast creature tokens.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose 2/2 with flying, 3/3 with vigilance, or 4/4. Until end of turn, creature tokens you control have the chosen characteristics.
If a triggered ability of a creature you control would be triggered by that creature entering the battlefield, that ability also triggers when that creature dies. The same is also true in reverse.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Will you defy the one who defies death itself?[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever True Chaos deals combat damage to a player, that player chooses beginning phase, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen phase during their next turn. After this phase, there is an additional phase of the chosen type.

Flying, haste
Whenever Skalathak, Deathless Wyrm enters the battlefield or attacks, exile a card at random from target player's graveyard.
Whenever Skalathak deals combat damage to a player, until end of turn, you may play a card exiled with Skalathak.

Each noncreature artifact, enchantment, or land you control is a 1/1 Elf creatures with haste in addition to its other types and abilities.
Whenever Morec, Lord of Nachtwood attacks, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if mana of a color that spell isn't was spent to cast it, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Even in death, the great wyrm commands fear and awe in equal measure.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever another nontoken permanent enters the battlefield under your control or is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent mills two cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]You admire stonework older than civilizations. Will you worship at this shrine or end its timeless evil?[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature has double strike and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may have it make an experience check.” [i](To make a successful experience check, exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than that creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Equip {3}

{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Spend only mana of three different colors to activate this ability.

When Solemn Stonegazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Solemn Stonegazer: Exile target permanent.
Put to the Sword deals 4 damage to any target. If excess damage is dealt this way, create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.

cards.flavor_text: [i]You aim a final blow, but a crack and flash announce the fiend's escape. You wonder, is it better to die with dignity or live an eternal shadow life?[/i]
